definitions.text: (sports) the act of preventing the opposition from scoring
examples: the goalie made a brilliant save
the relief pitcher got credit for a save

definitions.text: save from ruin, destruction, or harm
to keep up and reserve for personal or special use
examples: She saved the old family photographs in a drawer
We pulled through most of the victims of the bomb attack

definitions.text: spend less; buy at a reduced price
make unnecessary an expenditure or effort
examples: This will save you a lot of time

definitions.text: spend sparingly, avoid the waste of
examples: The less fortunate will have to economize now
keep my job for me while I give birth
keep open the possibility of a merger
boot-up instructions are written on the hard disk
